thread.title: Oscars 2017: Who's to blame for botched best-picture award?
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Who's to blame for botched best-picture award?

author: Associated Press
title: Oscars 2017: Who's to blame for botched best-picture award?
text: The producers of "La La Land" were nearly done with their acceptance speeches for Best Picture, the Oscar broadcast's credits sequence about to roll, when a stir of whispers began on stage. Moments later "La La Land" producer Jordan Horowitz returned to the microphone and said "Moonlight won Best Picture" and insisting that "this is not a joke."
